changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE receipts ( id bigserial NOT NULL, name varchar(255) NOT NULL, author_id int8 NULL, country_id int8 NULL, complexity int8 NOT NULL, plain_text varchar(255) NOT NULL, title_image bytea NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT receipts_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT fk_receipt_of_author FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES authors (id), CONSTRAINT fk_receipt_from_country FOREIGN KEY (country_id) REFERENCES countries (id) );
